newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Oil products fuel rise in Dutch September PPI.
newsitem.headline: Oil products fuel rise in Dutch September PPI.

text.p: Higher prices for oil products fuelled a 0.9 percent rise in Dutch producer prices between August and September, the Central Bureau of Statistics (CBS) said on Monday.
Producer prices for manufactured goods would have risen by only 0.1 percent between August and September if oil product prices had remained stable, the CBS said.
Oil product prices rose 11.8 percent in the month to September, with domestic prices rising some seven percent and export prices rising some 14 percent, the CBS said.
